> [Davidson] takes us to be in touch with reality in all areas of culture — ethics as well as physics, literary criticism as well as biology — in a sense of "in touch with" which does not mean "representing reasonably accurately" but simply "caused by and causing."

— [Antirepresentationalism, Ethnocentrism, and Liberalism](/docs/phil/works/Antirepresentationalism, Ethnocentrism, and Liberalism.html)
